title: MSFS 2024 - thrustmaster T.16000M twin-engine config reverse trust prop and mixture leveler options
description:
In this video, we'll explore how to modify the profile we established in a previous video to better fit a twin-engine aircraft. We'll also complicate matters by incorporating the ability to reverse the throttle, ensuring the configuration is as comprehensive as possible.

Furthermore, we'll initiate an experiment to determine if we can manage both the aircraft's propeller and mixture, which will prove to be quite the challenge.

Make sure to catch these expert tips to elevate your flight simulation experience!

00:00 - intro
00:24 - intro video
00:33 - cockpit leveler overview
01:36 - profiles
03:14 - changing the throttle levelers
04:38 - adding throttle reverse functionality
09:30 - changing the leveler sensitivity
11:13 - controlling the propeller and mixture levelers - option 1
17:01 - controlling the propeller and mixture levelers - option 2
20:39 - outro

If you are looking for steps how to configure the yoke, check this video: 
https://youtu.be/Qkdgql7xCww
